items: (19) Hirokazu Takahashi, Yoshiki Ito, Tomoyo I, Shiramatsu, Naoki Ishida, Karin Oshima, Kaho Magami: “Beat synchronization in rats.” 9th Mismatch Negativity Conference (MMN 2022): p.58, 2022 (福島, 2022年9月21日)

(20) Tomoyo I. Shiramatsu, Hirokazu Takahashi: “A new functional role of MMN-like response beyond simple deviance detection: using animal models to elucidate the underlying neural mechanisms of schizophrenia.” 9th Mismatch Negativity Conference (MMN 2022): pp.89-90, 2022 (福島, 2022年9月21日)
